name: Beat Saber 3D
description:
Beat Saber is a special rhythm game where slashing the beats as they are coming at you, but be careful, there are not only cube, some obstacles are coming too, don't hit them or you will be killed. Our goal is to make players almost dance while cutting the cubes and avoiding obstacles. Each cut is strongly supported by great sound and visual effects to emphasize the rhythm. This stunning neon game will give you a wonderful time to relax with numerous levels, top hit songs, and fantastic gameplay.

How to play:
- Choose your favorite song and click to start
- Feel the beat, hold, and drag to cut the blocks. Don't forget to avoid all obstacles and collect bonuses.

Features:
Stunning design
Numerous levels to challenge your skills.
Super-easy gameplay. Just hold your finger.
Relax with top hit music.

This game is what you looking for. PLAY IT!!!!
